statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: ZLGG found a magic theory that the bigger banana the bigger banana peel .This important theory can help him make a portal in our universal. Unfortunately, making a pair of portals will cost min{T} energies. T in a path between point V and point U is the length of the longest edge in the path. There may be lots of paths between two points. Now ZLGG owned L energies and he want to know how many kind of path he could make.

statement.title: Input
statement.content: There are multiple test cases. The first line of input contains three integer N, M and Q (1 < N ≤ 10,000, 0 < M ≤ 50,000, 0 < Q ≤ 10,000). N is the number of points, M is the number of edges and Q is the number of queries. Each of the next M lines contains three integers a, b, and c (1 ≤ a, b ≤ N, 0 ≤ c ≤ 10^8) describing an edge connecting the point a and b with cost c. Each of the following Q lines contain a single integer L (0 ≤ L ≤ 10^8).

statement.title: Output
statement.content: Output the answer to each query on a separate line.
